name: Cat Search in Medieval Times
description:
Meow!

More than 100 cats are hiding in this medieval city! Can you find them all? Some cats are more hidden than others, some lurk in the castle, while others lurk in the trees. There are also some lost wanted cats! Find the hidden wanted posters. Each poster will give you 1 hint that you can use if you are stuck.

Relax with a drink, while you explore this short but sweet hidden object game!

KEY FEATURES
  • 120 Hidden cats
  • 6 Hidden wanted posters
  • 6 Hints
  • Hand-Drawn medieval city
  • A lot of meowing sound effect

CONTROLS
ZOOM - Scroll Wheel
MOVE IMAGE - Hold down left mouse button and drag
PAUSE - Escape or click top left


My cat "Melis" was a great moral support during the development of this game



Artist - Anna Pankevych
Ingame music - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QSMc6b5DDEs&ab_channel=PGNMusic

Check out my first game!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2153770/Coin_Flipper/
